Detailed Description

Period structure for creating lists of periods (e.g.

for spill schedules).

Function Documentation

int check_daily_period_list ( PERIOD_LIST *  day  ) 

takes a period list which consists of days with subperiods as hours.

confirms that days and hours are within range. return: 0 ok 1 error

int dam_slice_in_schedule ( PERIOD_LIST *  sched,
int  slice 
)

examines a schedule consisting of a period list for days with subperiods for hours.

determines if the given dam time slice (from beginning of season) falls within the range of the list. note that >= 50% of a dam time slice must fall during a scheduled hour range to qualify. return: 0 slice not within schedule 1 slice in schedule
